text:
I am on AIX 5.1, i have try to use a good package of tomcat from a linux 
platform (tar and bzip2)
On the linux platform, Tomcat Administration is OK
But i have still the problem on AIX
I still need help ....
creator: jpclerc@hotmail.com

text:
You need to use gnutar.

http://marc.theaimsgroup.com/?l=tomcat-user&m=104978978819668&w=2

covers this.
creator: medthomas@ntlworld.com
jpclerc@hotmail.com
text:
I have take the product on Linux with a cpio (cpio -oBv -H bin)
I have extract on AIX 5.1 (cpio -iBvcd)
It's now OK

It was bas with the "tar" command !!!!!

Thanks for your help
